sql-statement.sql: FROM t_crm_contract t301 LEFT JOIN t_crm_customer t101 ON t101.id = t301.customerid AND t101.dbid = t301.dbid LEFT JOIN t_crm_department depart ON depart.id = t301.departmentid AND depart.dbid = t301.dbid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, item_label AS name FROM t_crm_list_item t1 WHERE t1.dbid = ${contextDTO.dbId} AND list_id = 1005 ) item1 ON item1.id = t301.type LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, item_label AS name FROM t_crm_list_item t2 WHERE t2.dbid = ${contextDTO.dbId} AND list_id = 1006 ) item2 ON item2.id = t301. status LEFT JOIN t_crm_sales_opportunity t201 ON t201.id = t301.opportunityid AND t201.dbid = t301.dbid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contractid, sum(amount) AS mount FROM t_crm_payments WHERE dbid = ${contextDTO.dbId} GROUP BY contractid ) pay ON t301.id = pay.contractid LEFT JOIN t_crm_user t101User ON t101.owner_id = t101User.user_id AND t101.dbid = t101User.dbid LEFT JOIN t_crm_user t301User ON t301.ownerId = t301User.user_id AND t301.dbid = t301User.dbid WHERE t301.dbid = ${contextDTO.dbId} AND t101.owner_id IS NOT NULL <% data = setFn(data,"t301","tableAliases"); %> and ${callTemplateFn("winbons.contract.getContractExistsSqlByType",contextDTO,data)} <% commonSql("winbons.common.params",filters!,sorts!); %>
